mapper.sql: product_id, name, service_time, price, preferential_price, discount_rate, discount_price, type, product_status, seller_id, product_describe, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, name, service_time, price, preferential_price, discount_rate, discount_price, type, product_status, seller_id, product_describe, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTime,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preferentialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{productStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

product_id,
name,
service_time,
price,

discount_price,

product_status,

mapper.update:
update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_time = #{serviceTime,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
preferential_price = #{preferentialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_price = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
product_status = #{productStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_describe = #{productDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_time = #{serviceTime,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, preferential_price = #{preferentialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount_price = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, product_status = #{productStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_describe = #{productDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.name AS NAME, p.price AS price, p.service_time as serviceTime, sust.nick_name AS servNickName, p.product_status AS productStatus, p.create_time AS createTime, p.modify_time AS modifyTime FROM product p LEFT JOIN customer sust ON p.seller_id = sust.customer_id where 1 = 1
AND sust.nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{servNickName},'%')
AND p.name LIKE concat('%',#{orderType},'%')
LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

SELECT count(1) FROM product p LEFT JOIN customer sust ON p.seller_id = sust.customer_id where 1 = 1
AND sust.nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{servNickName},'%')
AND p.name LIKE concat('%',#{orderType},'%')
